graph_titles.title: Proportion of victims of physical violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to police
Proportion of victimes of sexual violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to police

indicator_name: Proportion of victims of (a) physical, (b) psychological and/or (c) sexual violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms
SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.3: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.3.1: Proportion of victims of (a) physical, (b) psychological and/or (c) sexual violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms
STAT_CONC_DEF: Number of victims of violent crime in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms, as a percentage of all victims of violent crime in the previous 12 months.
DATA_COMP: Data were readily available to report on this indicator as specified by the metadata. Please refer to the sources to access additional information on the metadata or source.
REC_USE_LIM: Excludes incidents of sexual assault and physical assault between spouses.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.3: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 16.3.1: Proportion of victims of (a) physical, (b) psychological and/or (c) sexual violence in the previous 12 months who reported their victimization to competent authorities or other officially recognized conflict resolution mechanisms
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
source_url_text_1: Victimization incidents reported by Canadians, by type of offence, 2019
source_url_text_2: Victimization incidents reported by Canadians, by reporting to the police and type of offence, 1999, 2004, 2009, and 2014

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 16 : Paix, justice et institutions efficaces
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 16.3 : Promouvoir l'état de droit dans l'ordre interne et international et garantir à tous un égal accès à la justice
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 16.3.1 : Proportion des personnes victimes de violence (a) physique, (b) psychologique et/ou (c) sexuelle au cours des 12 mois précédents ayant signalé les faits aux autorités compétentes ou recouru à d’autres mécanismes de règlement des différends officiellement reconnus
fr.STAT_CONC_DEF: Nombre de victimes de crimes violents au cours des 12 mois précédents qui ont signalé leur victimisation aux autorités compétentes ou à d'autres mécanismes de résolution des conflits officiellement reconnus, en pourcentage de toutes les victimes de violence au cours des 12 mois précédents.
fr.DATA_COMP: Data were readily available to report on this indicator as specified by the metadata. Please refer to the sources to access additional information on the metadata or source.
fr.REC_USE_LIM: Exclut les agressions sexuelles et les voies de fait entre conjoints.
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 16 : Paix, justice et institutions efficaces
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Cible 16.3 : Promouvoir l'état de droit dans l'ordre interne et international et garantir à tous un égal accès à la justice
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicateur 16.3.1 : Proportion des personnes victimes de violence (a) physique, (b) psychologique et/ou (c) sexuelle au cours des 12 mois précédents ayant signalé les faits aux autorités compétentes ou recouru à d’autres mécanismes de règlement des différends officiellement reconnus
fr.un_custodian_agency: Office des Nations Unies contre la drogue et le crime (ONUDC)
fr.goal_meta_link_text: Métadonnées des objectifs de développement durable des Nations Unies
